name: Kerala Backwater
summary: Exploring the mesmerizing Kerala backwaters by houseboat and foot
description: Embark on a 7-day adventure through the serene backwaters of Kerala, where you will glide through tranquil canals on traditional houseboats, explore lush landscapes, and experience local culture. Begin your journey in the picturesque town of Alleppey, cruise through Vembanad Lake, visit the famous Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary, and take a peaceful stroll on Pathiramanal Island. As you navigate through the emerald waters, you’ll witness Kerala’s unique ecosystem and wildlife. Conclude your tour with a relaxing day at Marari Beach. This tour offers a perfect blend of nature, relaxation, and adventure in the heart of Kerala’s backwaters.

startLocation.address: Mall Road, Manali, Himachal Pradesh, India

name: The Himalayan Hiker
summary: Breathtaking hike through the stunning Himalayan mountain ranges
description: Experience the tranquility and beauty of the Himalayas on this 5-day hiking adventure. Walk through scenic trails, enjoy panoramic views, and breathe the fresh mountain air. From Manali to picturesque mountain villages, this tour offers a perfect balance of adventure and relaxation.

startLocation.address: Main Bazaar Rd, Leh, Ladakh, India

name: The Snow Adventurer in Ladakh
summary: Exciting snow adventure in Ladakh with snowboarding and skiing
description: Embark on a thrilling snow adventure in the majestic landscapes of Ladakh. Enjoy skiing and snowboarding across rugged terrains and explore the beauty of the Himalayan ranges. This tour is perfect for thrill-seekers looking for a challenging and exhilarating winter experience in the heart of Ladakh!

name: Desert Odyssey
summary: Experience the mesmerizing deserts of Rajasthan
description: Immerse yourself in the enchanting landscapes of Rajasthan's deserts. Enjoy camel rides through golden sands, visit stunning forts, and experience the vibrant local culture. This adventure offers a perfect blend of excitement and relaxation, showcasing the beauty of the Thar Desert and its rich heritage.

startLocation.address: Rajpath, India Gate, Central Secretariat, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India

name: The City Wanderer
summary: Exploring the historic and cultural landmarks of New Delhi
description:
Experience the grandeur of New Delhi, with a special focus on the iconic India Gate. Enjoy guided tours through the city's rich history and vibrant culture, exploring important landmarks and local attractions. Immerse yourself in the heritage and beauty of India's capital city!
Join us for a journey that encompasses the best of what New Delhi has to offer, from its architectural wonders to its bustling markets and delectable cuisine.

name: Beach Blitz
summary: An exhilarating adventure of water sports and beach fun in Goa
description:
Join us for the ultimate beach experience in Goa! From thrilling water sports like jet skiing, parasailing, and banana boat rides to relaxing beach volleyball and bonfire nights, there's something for everyone. Enjoy the beautiful sunsets, delicious Goan cuisine, and vibrant nightlife.

Whether you're a thrill-seeker or just looking to unwind, this tour has it all. Explore the stunning beaches, make new friends, and create unforgettable memories along the way!

name: The Star Gazer
summary: The most remote and stunningly beautiful places for seeing the night sky

name: Sula Wine Tour
summary: Experience the best of Indian wines with guided tastings, vineyard tours, and local cuisine.
description:
Join us for an unforgettable experience at Sula Vineyards, one of India's premier wine destinations. Enjoy guided tours of the picturesque vineyards, learn about the wine-making process, and indulge in exclusive tastings of Sula's finest wines. 
Explore the scenic beauty of Nashik as you savor delicious local cuisine paired with exquisite wines. This tour promises not just great flavors but also stunning views and a relaxing atmosphere.
